title: Centre

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, choose to Analyze a player.
- When you Analyze, you learn their role and their defense/attack values. You learn if they would be protected from a basic attack tonight.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When you lose possession of the Ball, you learn the name of the player who stole it.
- Factional chat
- Gains powerful defense if carrying the Ball
- Replaces abilities with factional kill if carrying the Ball
- You have one higher level of attack when attacking a player you've analyzed.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill everyone who opposes the team.

desc:
Post 2866
*we're playing rugby, he's playing 4d chess*
